Why should I buy a paid plan?

Our free plans have a limit of max 3 interviews/assignments per day. In addition to that, you have unlimited access to interview playback and history that you can access in our paid plans. To see a detailed comparison, refer to the chart above.

Will I be charged for a test invite that the candidate did not attempt?+

No, you will not be charged for test invites that were not attempted by the candidates.

Can I add more team members than my limit on the plan?+

Yes, you can add more team members by upgrading your plan or paying for additional seats.

When is an interview deducted from my quota?+

An interview is deducted from your quota when it is scheduled and conducted, regardless of the outcome.

Why should I buy a paid plan?+

Paid plans offer unlimited access to interview playback, detailed feedback reports, and priority scheduling.

What are my payment options?+

You can pay using credit card, debit card, or bank transfer. We also offer monthly and yearly billing options.

Can we take concurrent interviews on one account?+

Yes, you can take concurrent interviews on one account depending on your plan's limits.

What happens when I add my team members?+

When you add your team members, they get access to the interview scheduling, conducting, and feedback features based on your plan.

How is interview on Fintervue different than Zoom, Google Meets, and Teams?+

Fintervue offers specialized tools for interview scheduling, conducting, feedback, and detailed reporting, making it more suited for professional interviews.

Is the interview and assignment quota in my plan same?+

No, interview and assignment quotas are separate. Please check your plan details for specific limits.
